nfo.control

Class MainViewItemListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfo.control.MainViewItemListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MainViewItemListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Handle menu item reactions.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Rio Alexandre

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String ABOUT_TEXT
      Text displayed in the about dialog, after clicking on about in the menu bar.
      private static java.lang.String CONFIRM_TEXT
      Text displayed if the text area is not empty and have to be cleared.
      private static java.lang.String helptext
      Text displayed in the help dialog, after clicking on help in the menu bar.
      private static MainViewItemListener selfRef 
      private static java.lang.String SIZE_WARNING_TEXT
      Text displayed if the file lines are longer than 80 columns ( this is deprecated).
      private NfoView theView
      Frame containing the Component having listener.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainViewItemListener()
      Create an ItemListener to handle events on the menu items.

      private void openAction()
      Open a file and display it, if a file is already displayed ask to confirm the action.
      void quitAction()
      Exit the application after confirmation if the text area is not empty.
      private void save()
      Write the content of the textArea in the currentFile.
      private void saveAction()
      Write the content of the text area in the current file, if its not defined call saveAsAction()
      private void saveAsAction()
      Ask to choose the name of the file to save.
      private void saveProfilesAction()
      Ask for a location for saving all the loaded profiles.
